#### Exercise 1: Setup

__1.a__ Install the tidyverse and knitr.

```{r, message = FALSE}

### your code goes here
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("knitr")
```

__1.b__ Load the `tidyverse`, `knitr`, and set the precision to 2 digits.

```{r, message=FALSE}

### your code goes here

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
options(digits=2)


```
